product_name: Yurbuds Focus Limited Edition Wireless Earbuds
long_description: Cut the cord and unleash your inner athlete with the Yurbuds Focus Limited Edition Wireless Earbuds. These stereo Bluetooth earphones lock into place and give you freedom to move.
short_description: Cut the cord and unleash your inner athlete with the Yurbuds Focus Limited Edition Wireless Earbuds. These stereo Bluetooth earphones lock into place and give you freedom to move.
